entry.title: https://github.com/233boy/v2ray
entry.content: 最好用的 V2Ray 一键安装脚本 & 管理脚本

entry.title: https://github.com/DaoCloud/public-image-mirror
entry.content: 很多镜像都在国外。比如 gcr 。国内下载很慢，需要加速。致力于提供连接全世界的稳定可靠安全的容器镜像服务。

entry.title: https://github.com/itzg/docker-minecraft-server
entry.content: Docker image that provides a Minecraft Server for Java Edition that automatically downloads selected version at startup

entry.title: https://github.com/kiddin9/Kwrt
entry.content: 一分钟在线定制编译 X86/64, NanoPi R2S R4S R5S R6S, 斐讯 Phicomm N1 K2P, 树莓派 Raspberry Pi, 香橙派 Orange Pi, 红米AX6, 小米AX3600, 小米AX9000, 红米AX6S 小米AX3200, 红米AC2100, 华硕ASUS, 网件NETGEAR 等主流软硬路由

entry.title: https://github.com/ophub/amlogic-s9xxx-openwrt
entry.content: Support for OpenWrt in Amlogic, Rockchip and Allwinner boxes. Support a311d, s922x, s905x3, s905x2, s912, s905d, s905x, s905w, s905, s905l, rk3588, rk3568, rk3399, rk3328, h6, etc.

entry.content: // Aesthetic, dynamic and minimal dots for Arch hyprland

entry.title: https://github.com/termux/termux-packages
entry.content: A package build system for Termux.

entry.title: https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite
entry.content: Bazzite is a cloud native image built upon Fedora Atomic Desktops that brings the best of Linux gaming to all of your devices - including your favorite handheld.

entry.title: https://github.com/winapps-org/winapps
entry.content: Run Windows apps such as Microsoft Office/Adobe in Linux (Ubuntu/Fedora) and GNOME/KDE as if they were a part of the native OS, including Nautilus integration. Hard fork of https://github.com/Fmstrat/winapps/
